name: pancakeswap-sniping-bot
description: A free NodeJS sniper bot built to work with PancakeSwap

scripts.start: node ./pancakeswap-sniping-bot -- tokenAddress=0xc9849e6fdb743d08faee3e34dd2d1bc69ea11a51 buyingBnbAmount=0.05 senderPrivateKey=0x8da4ef21b864d2cc526dbdb2a120bd2874c36c9d0a1fb7f8c63d7f7a8b41de8f createLogs=true gasPrice=7 transactionSlippage=5 bscNetwork=mainnet
